raw: Dollar hits highest since October on Powell's upbeat economic view .

replaced: Dollar hit a four - month high against the euro on Tuesday as investors chased higher returns in the U.S. , and after Powell adopted an upbeat view of the U.S. economy .

raw: The greenback has gained against the single currency as data reinforces a view that the U.S. economic outlook is more favorable than that of the euro zone , and on safety buying on concerns about the economic impact of the coronavirus outbreak that originated in China .
replaced: The greenback has gained against Dollar as data reinforces a view that the U.S. economic outlook is more favorable than that of the euro , and on safety buying on concerns about the economic impact of the coronavirus outbreak that originated in China .

raw: Low volatility across most of the foreign exchange market has also encouraged investors to seek out carry trades , where they borrow in low - yielding currencies such as the euro and the franc and invest in dollars or other high - yielding currencies .
replaced: Low volatility across most of the FX market has also encouraged investors to seek out carry trades , where investors borrow in low - yielding currencies such as the euro and Dollar and invest in dollars or other high - yielding currencies .

raw: “ One of the big prevailing narratives right now is for the carry trade , ” said Erik Nelson , a currency strategist at Wells Fargo in New York .
replaced: “ One of the big prevailing narratives right now is for the carry trade , ” said Nelson .

raw: “ As volatility seems to be non - existent in the FX market a lot of people are piling into this short euro , long higher beta , higher interest rate currencies . ”
replaced: “ As volatility seems to be non - existent in the FX market a lot of people are piling into this short euro , long higher beta , higher interest rate currencies . ”

raw: At the same time , “ you ’re looking at a euro zone economy that just ca n’t seem to get a lot of traction , ” Nelson said .
replaced: At the same time , “ you ’re looking at a euro zone economy that just ca n’t seem to get a lot of traction , ” Nelson said .

raw: “ That ’s also more fundamentally supporting this idea that the euro is sort of flat on its back right now . ”
replaced: “ That ’s also more fundamentally supporting this idea that the euro is sort of flat on the euro back right now . ”

raw: The euro EUR= fell as low as $ 1.0892 on Tuesday , the lowest since Oct. 1 , before rising back to $ 1.0907 .

raw: Comments by Powell on Tuesday affirmed the view that the U.S. central bank is unlikely to change interest rates in the near term .
replaced: Comments by Powell on Tuesday affirmed the view that the U.S. central bank is unlikely to change interest rates in the near term .

raw: Over the second half of 2019 “ the economy appeared resilient to the global headwinds that had intensified last summer , ” Powell said in remarks to the House Financial Services Committee , as economic activity increased further and the labor market strengthened .
replaced: Over the second half of 2019 “ the U.S. economy appeared resilient to the global headwinds that had intensified last summer , ” Powell said in remarks to the House Financial Services Committee , as economic activity increased further and the labor market strengthened .

raw: With risks like trade policy uncertainty receding and global growth stabilizing , Powell signaled he saw no reason to adjust U.S. interest rates , unless new developments cause a “ material reassessment ” to the current outlook .
replaced: With risks like trade policy uncertainty receding and global growth stabilizing , Powell signaled Powell saw no reason to adjust U.S. interest rates , unless new developments cause a “ material reassessment ” to the current outlook .
